column4: Hey, I have a quick question. I have 8 GB of system ram. How much HDD partition space for Swap drive?
if you want hibernation, you need as much contiguous swap space as memory you'll be using. so, to be on the safe side, 8GB or more.
assuming you're not tight on hard-disk space, I'd throw a little bit extra on there, just to avoid the partition creator rounding down and messing things up
